item.description:
Have lunch or dinner at Kelly’s Roast Beef with your M&M friends and help raise money
for our Chapter at the same time!

The Fundraiser will run from opening to close (11:00 AM to 8:00PM), but keep in mind that if you come after 5:00 PM, you'll be there for "Kelly's Kids’ Night", which features free kids activities including face painting, crafts, balloons
and storytelling.

Use the special coupon (email me for a copy to print) and Kelly's will donate 25% of the proceeds (that day only) to our Chapter. Kelly’s is located inside the Jordan’s Furniture building on Route 9 in Natick.
item.name: Family Activity/Fundraiser - Kids’ Night at Kelly’s Roast Beef
